queries.query: SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='logaz' AND pin='pwqq';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='log9' AND pin='paa';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='log1' AND pin='pw1';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='log2' AND pin='pw2';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='log3' AND pin='pw3';
SELECT bcct FROM users WHERE login='' or 1=1 -- AND pin=;
SELECT acct FROM users WHERE login='' UNION SELECT cardNo from CreditCards where accNo=7032 -- AND pin=;
SELECT acct FROM users WHERE login='doe' AND pin=0; drop table users
SELECT acct FROM users WHERE login='' AND pin=convert(int, (select top 1 name from sysobject where xtype'u'))
SELECT acct FROM users WHERE login='legalUser' AND ASCII(SUBSTRING((SELECT TOP 1 name FROM sysobjects)1,1)) > X WAITFOR 10 -- AND pin=;
SELECT acct FROM users WHERE login='' AND pin=0; exec{char(0x73687574646f776e)};
SELECT * from phonebook WHERE username='urs1' AND password='pw1'
SELECT * from phonebook WHERE username='urs2' AND password='pw2'
SELECT * from phonebook WHERE username='urs3' AND password='pw3'
SELECT * from phonebook WHERE username='John' OR 1=1 --password='not-needed'
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE name='admin1' AND password='abc1'
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE name='admin2' AND password='abc2'
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE name='admin' AND password='abc' OR 1=1
SELECT * FROM HISTORIQUE_MEMBRE;
SELECT * FROM NON_HISTORIQUE_MEMBRE;
SELECT * FROM MEMBRE;
SELECT * FROM HISTORIQUE;
SELECT * FROM HISTOEMBRE;
SELECT * FROM ELEVE, MEMBRE WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = MEMBRE.id_eleve AND MEMBRE.annee = '2009';
SELECT * FROM ELEVE, MEMBRE WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = MEMBRE.id_eleve AND MEMBRE.annee = '2011';
SELECT * FROM ELEVE, MEMBRE WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = MEMBRE.id_eleve AND MEMBRE.annee = '2010';
SELECT * FROM ELEVE, MEMBRE WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = MEMBRE.id_eleve AND MEMBRE.annee = '2012';
SELECT * FROM ELEVE, MEMBRE WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = MEMBRE.id_eleve AND MEMBRE.annee = '2013';
SELECT * FROM ELEVE, MEMBRE WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = MEMBRE.id_eleve AND MEMBRE.annee = '2010' OR 1=1 ;
SELECT * FROM MEMBRE_ACTUEL
SELECT * FROM JEU, EVENEMENT, UTILISE WHERE JEU.id_jeu = UTILISE.id_jeu AND UTILISE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND EVENEMENT.id_evt = 3;
SELECT * FROM JEU, EVENEMENT, UTILISE WHERE JEU.id_jeu = UTILISE.id_jeu AND UTILISE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND EVENEMENT.id_evt = '4';
SELECT * FROM JEU, EVENEMENT, UTILISE WHERE JEU.id_jeu = UTILISE.id_jeu AND UTILISE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND EVENEMENT.id_evt = '5';
SELECT * FROM JEU, EVENEMENT, UTILISE WHERE JEU.id_jeu = UTILISE.id_jeu AND UTILISE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND EVENEMENT.id_evt = '6';
SELECT * FROM JEU, EVENEMENT, UTILISE WHERE JEU.id_jeu = UTILISE.id_jeu AND UTILISE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND EVENEMENT.id_evt = '7';
SELECT * FROM JEU, EVENEMENT, UTILISE WHERE JEU.id_jeu = UTILISE.id_jeu AND UTILISE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND EVENEMENT.id_evt = '4' OR 1=1;

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ELEVE, EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE, MEMBRE WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = PARTICIPE.id_eleve AND ELEVE.id_eleve = MEMBRE.id_eleve AND PARTICIPE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND year(EVENEMENT.date_evt) > MEMBRE.annee;

SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ELEVE, EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE, MEMBRE WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = PARTICIPE.id_eleve AND ELEVE.id_eleve = MEMBRE.id_eleve AND PARTICIPE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND year(EVENEMENT.date_evt) > MEMBRE.annee;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE WHERE PARTICIPE.id_eleve = 18 AND PARTICIPE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND year(EVENEMENT.date_evt) = YEAR(NOW())
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE WHERE PARTICIPE.id_eleve = 19 AND PARTICIPE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND year(EVENEMENT.date_evt) = YEAR(NOW())
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE WHERE PARTICIPE.id_eleve = 19 AND PARTICIPE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND year(EVENEMENT.date_evt) = YEAR(NOW())
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE WHERE PARTICIPE.id_eleve = 19 AND PARTICIPE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND year(EVENEMENT.date_evt) = YEAR(NOW())
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE WHERE PARTICIPE.id_eleve = 19 AND PARTICIPE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND year(EVENEMENT.date_evt) = YEAR(NOW())

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE WHERE PARTICIPE.id_eleve = convert(int, (select top 1 id from sysobject where xtype'u')) AND PARTICIPE.id_evt = EVENEMENT.id_evt AND year(EVENEMENT.date_evt) = YEAR(NOW())
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE WHERE EVENEMENT.id_evt = PARTICIPE.id_evt AND EVENEMENT.id_evt = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVENEMENT, PARTICIPE WHERE EVENEMENT.id_evt = PARTICIPE.id_evt AND EVENEMENT.id_evt = 4;

select COUNT(*), nom_eleve FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre AND LIVRE.titre = 'Fascination' GROUP BY nom_eleve;

select COUNT(*), nom_eleve FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre AND LIVRE.titre = 'Ahhhhhhhhh' GROUP BY nom_eleve;

SELECT date_rendu, nom_eleve  FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve  AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre  AND LIVRE.titre = 'Fascination' ORDER BY date_rendu DESC;

SELECT date_rendu, nom_eleve  FROM ELEVE, LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE ELEVE.id_eleve = EMPRUNT.id_eleve  AND EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire = EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = LIVRE.id_livre  AND LIVRE.titre = 'Ehhhhhhhhhh' ORDER BY date_rendu DESC;
SELECT sum(total.an)/ 12 AS moyenne FROM (SELECT count(*) AS an FROM EMPRUNT WHERE YEAR(date_rendu)='2012' GROUP BY MONTH(date_rendu)) AS total;
SELECT sum(total.an)/ 12 AS moyenne FROM (SELECT count(*) AS an FROM EMPRUNT WHERE YEAR(date_rendu)='2018' GROUP BY MONTH(date_rendu)) AS total;

SELECT LIVRE.titre, count(*) as nombre  FROM LIVRE, EXEMPLAIRE, EMPRUNT  WHERE LIVRE.id_livre = EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre  AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire = EMPRUNT.id_exemplaire  GROUP BY LIVRE.titre  ORDER BY nombre DESC;
SELECT date_evt, lieu, count(*) AS nombre  FROM PARTICIPE, EVENEMENT  WHERE EVENEMENT.id_evt = PARTICIPE.id_evt  GROUP BY EVENEMENT.id_evt  ORDER BY nombre DESC;

SELECT nom_jeu, SUM(nombre) AS total FROM JEU, UTILISE, (SELECT EVENEMENT.id_evt, count(*) AS nombre FROM PARTICIPE, EVENEMENT WHERE EVENEMENT.id_evt = PARTICIPE.id_evt GROUP BY EVENEMENT.id_evt) AS PARTICIPATION WHERE JEU.id_jeu = UTILISE.id_jeu AND UTILISE.id_evt = PARTICIPATION.id_evt GROUP BY JEU.id_jeu ORDER BY total DESC;
SELECT texte, note  FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE COMMENTAIRE.id_jeu = 2;
SELECT texte, note  FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE COMMENTAIRE.id_jeu = 3;
SELECT texte, note  FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE COMMENTAIRE.id_evt = 4;
SELECT texte, note  FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE COMMENTAIRE.id_jeu = 5;

SELECT IFNULL(texte, 'Non renseigné') AS texte, IFNULL(note, 'Non renseigné') AS note, IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, 'evt', 'jeu') AS type,  IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_jeu) AS id FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE id_eleve = 1;

SELECT IFNULL(texte, 'Non renseigné') AS texte, IFNULL(note, 'Non renseigné') AS note, IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, 'evt', 'jeu') AS type,  IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_jeu) AS id FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE id_eleve = 2;

SELECT IFNULL(texte, 'Non renseigné') AS texte, IFNULL(note, 'Non renseigné') AS note, IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, 'evt', 'jeu') AS type,  IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_jeu) AS id FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE id_eleve = 3;

SELECT IFNULL(texte, 'Non renseigné') AS texte, IFNULL(note, 'Non renseigné') AS note, IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, 'evt', 'jeu') AS type,  IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_jeu) AS id FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE id_eleve = 4;

SELECT IFNULL(texte, 'Non renseigné') AS texte, IFNULL(note, 'Non renseigné') AS note, IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, 'evt', 'jeu') AS type,  IF(COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_evt, COMMENTAIRE.id_jeu) AS id FROM COMMENTAIRE WHERE id_eleve = 5;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EXEMPLAIRE LEFT JOIN LIVRE_EMPRUNTE ON EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire = LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_exemplaire WHERE EXEMPLAIRE.empruntable = TRUE AND LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_emprunt is null AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = 4;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EXEMPLAIRE LEFT JOIN LIVRE_EMPRUNTE ON EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire = LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_exemplaire WHERE EXEMPLAIRE.empruntable = TRUE AND LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_emprunt is null AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = 5;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EXEMPLAIRE LEFT JOIN LIVRE_EMPRUNTE ON EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire = LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_exemplaire WHERE EXEMPLAIRE.empruntable = TRUE AND LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_emprunt is null AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = 6;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EXEMPLAIRE LEFT JOIN LIVRE_EMPRUNTE ON EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire = LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_exemplaire WHERE EXEMPLAIRE.empruntable = TRUE AND LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_emprunt is null AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = 7;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EXEMPLAIRE LEFT JOIN LIVRE_EMPRUNTE ON EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire = LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_exemplaire WHERE EXEMPLAIRE.empruntable = TRUE AND LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_emprunt is null AND EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre = 8;

SELECT DISTINCT EXEMPLAIRE.id_livre FROM EXEMPLAIRE LEFT JOIN LIVRE_EMPRUNTE ON EXEMPLAIRE.id_exemplaire = LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_exemplaire WHERE EXEMPLAIRE.empruntable = TRUE AND LIVRE_EMPRUNTE.id_emprunt is null;

DELIMITER // CREATE TRIGGER 'MULTIPLE_COMMENT' BEFORE INSERT ON 'COMMENTAIRE' FOR EACH ROW BEGIN DECLARE NB_ID INTEGER; IF(NEW.id_evt is not null) THEN SELECT COUNT(*) INTO NB_ID FROM 'COMMENTAIRE' WHERE id_eleve=NEW.id_eleve AND id_evt=NEW.id_evt; END IF; IF(NEW.id_jeu is not null) THEN SELECT COUNT(*) INTO NB_ID FROM 'COMMENTAIRE' WHERE id_eleve=NEW.id_eleve AND id_jeu=NEW.id_jeu; END IF; IF (NB_ID>0) THEN SET NEW.id_eleve = NULL; SET NEW.id_jeu = NULL; SET NEW.id_evt = NULL; END IF; END;  //
